column4: Delicious food with excelent service, a must visit spot for food.. We ordered grilled mushroom and grilled cheese with local ouzo. Perfect.
Great food! Great atmosphere! We didn‚Äôt plan to visit but when we saw that much people, locals and tourists we got hungry very fast. Delicious!
Great food, big portions, excellent service, nice music. And mini ice creams as a compliment. Recommended.
The food is so good the place is good everything is so good the music the service is the best and at the end they give you mini ice cream
Wonderful, wonderful food (I will dream of their cheese dip for a long time), superb service and reasonable prices. I cannot recommend this place more.
I was surprised in a very good way. The service is quick and friendly and all the dishes are amazing. Is nearly the citadel in a very good position.
Exceptionally delicious food made of fresh and quality ingredients. And the service is even better, fast and very helpful staff.
Great place, the food was very good and the serving was pretty fast considering that it‚Äôs a very popular tavern in Kavala. So, good food, cold beer and a more than reasonable bill.
Delicious food and excellent service! We ate plato for two and the porn meat, the french fries and the vegetables were very delicious. They brought is and ice cream for desert!
Food, service, prices - everything in this place is excellent. I absolutely recommend if you spend time in Kavala.
Very nice, very tasty! The prices were very good. We enjoyed our cuisine and will certainly visit again. I recommend it.
Good place, wonderful atmosphere! Delicious food , big portions, good service and decent prices. We are very happy!
Maybe the best food in Kavala! Everything fresh with a lot of taste, traditional greek food. Staff so polite. The place is couzy and relaxing!

column3: Wonderful place fresh and delicious - highly recommended!!
column4: Absolutely wonderful! I have been here three times every time so delicious everything fresh and flavorful. I got suvlaki and salad with the stuffed grape leaves as appetizers. Highly recommended great value and loved the experience

We ate greek salad and grilled octopus both of them is very delicious. At the and of the meal you will be surprised with ice cream. We recommend there ƒ∞f you find time visit Mehmet Ali Pa≈üa ƒ∞maret on the other side of the road
Excellent food, polite staff and traditional music. It is next to the road and it's a bit i timate byt it is part of its charm.
Nice little Tavern in old Town Kavala. Best Giros I've ever eaten. Very good service with good recommendations. Perfect place. Go for it.
Good food, best waiters and super atmosphere. Verry nice location .. the waiters moves verry quickly

column3: The best traditional cuisine in Kavala
column4: Great customer service. Delicious food, big dishes, reasonable price. I would recommend the restaurant to anyone visiting Kavala!
We visit the restaurant each and every time when we are in Kavala. It is always a plasure. We definitely recommend it. Food and service are great.
Excellent food, nice people and great location. Perfect for dinner in the old town with your friends or family.
Very authentic and tasty food. Good prices. Locals are also eating here. (Good sign) Super nice service. Will definitely eat here again.
Very good food and service.The octopus and yogurt nabab was very good. The staff is perfect and we received icecream.

column3: A great place to eat tasty food!
column4: Perfect place to eat greek tasty cuisines, nice atmosphere, great service‚Ä¶we love it! Situated in the old town, but already checked that is not a tourist trap. Recommend it!
Very tasty and nice! The waiter's advices were formidable! Very nice interiors. Very quickly we obtain our food and drinks. The white wine was very nice!
The ambiance, the food and the service are all very good! Portions are super large and delicious. We even got an ice cream courtesy of the house! Keep it up!

column3: Great food and even better attitude!
column4: Great food and even better attitude! We already went to a few other restaurants but these guys were the best place during our stay. Thank you!
The food and the service are great. Also, it's very affordable. Nice traditional greek atmosphere üëç Would come again anytime
The stuff is very polite and fast. They find us a table in 5 minutes. Meat food is super, portions ate very big and the prices are ok.

Amazing food, extremely cheap, rich menu, fast and friendly service. Can't think of anything missing. We just had a really great dinner here, coudnt wait to leave some feedback. You won't regret it, give it a try.
Very typical and pleasant dinner. Waiters were all super kind. Menu is mainly meat based but there are good alternatives, loved the vine leaves stuffed with rice
The food is very good and cheap. We order the meat plate for 2 persons and was excellent. They offer us ice cream for dessert and was delicious.
Very good!! And have presents from restaurant - very tasty!! Atmosphere is very very cool!! Food and is super

EXCELLENT ! Amazing food (huge portion), great location, charming surrounding, really nice staff and really fair prices. You wont be disappointed we loved it. One of the best restaurant we went in the region.
‚ú®Great food, friendly personnel. Great value for money.‚ú®‚ú®‚ú®‚ú® Good location, near the castle. üè∞ Clean bathroom!‚ú®

column3: Amazing services, great food, incredible prices
column4: Prices are much lower than the restaurants from the port and the quality much above expectations. Services were amazing and everything deserve a 5/5

column3: Such places make Greece great again.
column4: After the unfortunate culinary experiences in Thassos, we discovered this amazing Mediterranean and Greek location with astonishment and joy. Impeccable services, delicious food and reasonable prices ...
The restaurant is very cosy. Food is delicious and the service is fast, with a smile. On the way to the Castle, we had this great break! And there is a free juicy cake at the end. Recommend

column3: Great place and very good service
column4: Excellent as usual. Second time here and again very good experience. Had octopus, calamari and risotto. Great all of the.
Excelent food! Good taste, cheap for the amount pf food we had, good wine, desert on the house, nice location. It was super nice !

column3: Very delicious food, perfect service, nice staff, cozy place
column4: It is a very nice and Cosy place, the Servise is excellent, food is more then delicious. We tried the octopus and calamari, it was the most delicious we tried in kavala.
Very good service with very good food. Overall is cheap. I recommend it very –æ—á–µ–Ω—å –±–æ–ª—å—à–æ–π much good
Fantastic food, exceptional service. WHAT a nice surprise, yummy fresh food, very quicky service and a fair price. You must try it!!!
Very nice place in old town of Kavala. Friendly service! Excellent food and reasonable prices. If you plan to come in Kavala you should try this restaurant.

column3: Great restaurant in the Old City of Kavala
column4: A very good restaurant. A very pleasant atmosphere. The owner is a very warm man, very careful. Delicious food, very decent prices. I highly recommend it to those who visit Kavala.

column3: Best place in the Old City of Kavala
column4: We loved this beautiful tavern in the Old City of Kavala! It is extremely picturesque,in the small streets of the old city. The menu was very good and the prices reasonable. I would definitely recommend it for a nice night in Kavala!

Everything is delicios and fresh cooked food! The atmosphere and the music is truly Greek! Service is perfect with very kind waiters, thank you Dimitrisüëç! This is a must to visit in Kavala and for sure we will miss this place untill next vacation.
The best food ever! Every year I travel in Kavala and in this place I can find the real taste of Greek cousin.

column3: Quitea and cosy, food and beverages
column4: Quite and cosy, food(try the yoghurt kebab) and beverages were nice. Waiter was nice and helpful. Highly recommend this place.
One of the best places in Kavala . Low prices / really greek authentic food . Amability/ diversity / cousy / diversity
Perfect place with amazing location and food. If in Kavala visit them, you will like them too for sure.
Must eat there!‚ù§ All is cheap and you eat a lotüòÉ, nice people, good greek music, a nice and quiet location...one of the best taverna in Kavala!
Love it there, good food, beautiful people! If you visit Kavala, this places a MUST ! Delicious food, wide variety of local cuisine, with amazing staff. Great location
One of the best places in Kavala. The meals were delicious, wide variety of local food - salads, vegetables, and meat. There is a recipe for everyone.
Very,very good place.Friendly staff,delicious food,...what you need more?!?!?!Good location in old town!!!

Really good food and It‚Äôs fair price. Staff were really friendly and helpful of choosing from the menu. Also we are amazed how nice and clean it was the toilet (most other places are disgusting) I would recommend that place.
Amazing place to visit, must try the food - the best in the city and the staff is amazing, very polite
Best food in Kavala. We have tried many restaurants in town but this one is the best. Familly, friendly business. Good location in old part of town.

Great place in the old part of the city. Everything was so delicious - we ate greek salad, aubergine with tomatoes and feta, octopus and many more. The prices are normal and I reccommended the place. Must visit.
Great food, especially the seafood and salads. Amazing staff, service and even prices, definitely deserves its high rating.
Big portions with best quality over price. Located in old town which nice for walk over. Recommended while you are in Kavala.

column3: Best place to eat in Kavala
column4: This place is really amazing. The best octopus i have ever tasted. The service is great and everything is delicious. Highly recommended. Just keep in mind that it is always full, so book a place in advance.
The food is very good. The staff are friendly and helpful. We recommend the fried balls made with zucchini and tomatoes. Also you should not miss the tzatziki.
The food as well as the serving are great. Is a quiet location which can be found very easy. Over all it was a 5 star experience and I‚Äôll come back for sure.
The best food in Kavala ! The boys are fast and very nice and the food is delicious and fresh . We will come back again !
It definitely deserves being the best restaurant in Kavala. Make sure to try the chicken souvlaki. Absolutely stunning. Great prices as well.

column3: Nice place in old Town of Kavala
column4: Very nice place,for meat and appetizers. Lovely Roka salad and very tasty zucini and tomato meatballs
We went for dinner. The restaurant focuses on local cuisine - mostly meat and salads. The waiters are nice and the service is quick. It‚Äôs not remarkably tasty, but it was a nice dinner place.
Very Good place with delicious food and perfect service. That was our best choice for traditional cuisine in Greece.
We came upon this restaurant in the old town, it is next to the road if you can find somewhere to park. Fabulous food in lovely surroundings with attentive friendly staff. Would highly recommend
Great restaurant! Great service! We enjoyed every second and every meal! The portion were huge and delicious! The best evening in Kavala!

column3: To Araliki - really number 1 in the city
column4: Great white wine, size of portions from medium to big. All ingredients are fresh. I‚Äôm glad what I was in this place.

We had different meal course including traditional Greek food and meat. They are good except yogurt kebap but I think we are from Kebap‚Äôs originüòä aubergine and salad is very good. I ate better tzcaki in Afitos. They are smiling people.
Authentic greek food. Choose to eat many of the starters to get a taste of the greek cucine. Fast service and very welcome people

We were there with my friends and we had a very delicious meal. Everything was perfectly cooked and staff was very kind, friendly and üòäüòâüòÖhandsome. We highly recommend this in Kavala, located in old town .
Nice place, service was good despite that there were some large groups, food were delicious and pricies are moderate. I recomand this place.
Perfect food, perfect service and perfect atmosphere! We eat tripleto, kalamari and octopus. Recommand!
Having our late lunch here at the moment.. Will be coming for dinner tonight again... What else can I say ?
Great food and location , big portions, good prices, friendly staff! Strangely but they do not serve coffee:(
This place is the best ranked in Kavala for a reason. It was fantastic..the calamari was friend to perfection, the souvlaki was delicious and the service was wonderful
Nice atmosphere, far from the crowds, delicious food, friendly staff, affordable. Definitely worth to visit!

We first came to the restaurant, but they were full. One of the guys managed to fix an additional table outside by the street. Only one of the guys spoke English (awesome and makes it more authentic.) Service 5/5 Food 5/5 Atmosphere 5/5

We saw on here that this restaurant was the best scoring in kavala and decided to try it. Everything from the music, the food and the service was just perfect. I higly recommend everyone to come here and try it. You will not be dissapointed!

This is a very good Greek restaurant. Souvlaki and soutzoukaki are the best. Fried potatoes are fresh cut. Salad are green and fresh. House wine is of good quality. I totally recommend this place. Great value for money. Friendly staff.
Friendly owner and staff one of the best dolma i have tasted. Truly recommendable their kebab w yogurt delicious. Quick service

The place is very nice and the food is tasty. That was the best octopus I have ever tried. The people are kind and smiley. It is full all the time, but if you wait some minutes there will be a table for you.
Food was excellent, stuff was very kind. Prices are really good..If you are looking for traditional greek food in Kavala, this is the place. Highly reccomend
Great food and service. Also the prices were very good. I will come back for sure. You get a bottle of water on the house which is nice.
The service was good even if the staff was super busy because of the festivale. The best meal of our trip.

column3: A place to have a great time
column4: Everything was perfect! The food, the service, location- perfect. We felt like home, the waiter was extremely polite.
Delicious food, friendly staff, nice location. Good prices too! The food comes quick, they serve you some nice warm bread as well. Recommend!
Awesome meal, nice personnel, super quick service!!! Greek music, delicious food and top prices! Highly recommended to anyone!
Lovely food, great service and people. The location is also pretty nice. The old city is very beautiful place to visit. Highly recommend.
Very delicious meat, great staff and service, thank you for ice cream and fruits, we enjoyed our food and ice cold beer
great place!! good food, nice staff. They gave us free icecream and wine. A must when you are in kavala!!
This taverna was recommended and did not disappoint. Busy but staff were attentive and food was very good.

column3: One of the best restaurants we dined at on our trip
column4: Had a wonderful experience dining here: the food was very tasty, the service was fast and the prices were the average for Kavala. As a bonus, the staff was very hospitable and the atmosphere was nice and lively.
Great atmosphere and good food in the heart of the old town. Good service and value of money. Recommend
I highly recommend this place when you visit Kavala. The food is awesome and the service is great. Amazing place - good prices for excelent quality!
The food is delicious. The restaurant is in peaceful area. Œ§he prices are very reasonable about 15 euros per person with wine.
Excellent place for tasty and quality food, clean restaurant with very friendly staff! Perfect for couples and friend groups
amazing fresh traditional and grilled food! In old town, staff very quick and helpful! Nice free dessert treated at the end of our meal!

The reviews for this place were good so after a drink in the Hotel ƒ∞maret we stopped for dinner. Very slow service. One meze item ordered and completely forgotten and souvlaki rather fatty, accompanying French fries totally fat bound. Good price but disappointing.

column3: The best food we ate in Kavala!
column4: Calamari and souvlaki were delicios!! The service is very good so are the prices! If we come to Kavala again we will sure come here to eat!
If you're looking for a really good Greek taverna which has superb food, excellent wine and great service- all at very reasonable prices then look no further.

column3: Very good food and at good price
column4: The food was very good for the price. We have just give only 7 euro and we eat a platter with some different meats. At start we eat a great soft and hot bread. Very nice place and the stuff was friendly.
Excellent salads, meat and bread. The fgod is delicous. The staff is extremely friendly and we have been here three times in three days

The staff is very friendly, helpful and nice. The food was absolutely delicious. They have good enough choices for non-meat eaters. The portions are huge. Definitely a great place and very good value to price ratio.
We have had dinner .. testy, nice service .. serving by John.. rice, zucchini balls, everything recommended.. try..
